common.guide_book: 《User Manual for Steel Bar Binding Robot》

wifi.connectFailed: Connection failed, please check if the password is correct or if the WiFi is working properly
wifi.useSavedPassword: Use saved password to connect to

errors.emptyCredentials: Username and password cannot be empty
errors.readManual: Please read the user manual and acknowledge its contents
errors.wifiPermission: Location permission is required to connect to WiFi
errors.needLocation: This app requires location permission to scan WiFi networks
errors.autoFindPointTips: In automatic point-finding mode, the tying robot cannot be restarted
errors.autoFindPointTips2: In automatic point-finding mode, the robot cannot be descended
errors.autoFindPointTips3: In automatic point-finding mode, the robot cannot be reset
errors.lockModeTips: In lock mode, the operation cannot be performed
errors.robotUnconnectedTips: Robot is not connected, cannot send commands
errors.robotDangerStatusTips: Robot is in soft emergency stop state, cannot send commands
errors.autoFindPointTips4: In automatic point-finding mode, the parameter settings cannot be performed
errors.autoFindPointTips5: In automatic point-finding mode, the robot operation cannot be performed
errors.autoFindPointTips6: In automatic point-finding mode, the ultrasonic cannot be enabled
errors.autoFindPointTips7: In automatic point-finding mode, the falling laser cannot be enabled

robot.robotStopped: Robot is in soft emergency stop state, cannot send commands
robot.robotDisconnected: Robot is not connected, cannot send commands
